author: nicktheman
title: One of the few set I able to keep that I got when I was a child
review:
compare to the truck set lego making right now, the truck of this set Look tiny, but when my aunt give this to me 16 years ago it's fantastic!  In my eyes this set look exacty like the truck on the highway (when i was like young).

the only thing that make this set feel unreal is when you put the mini figuar in the truck, otherwise it looks like a scare model.

I don't know how my aunt got this, but I so thankful that I am able to keep it.

(This review  is short because I can't remember how i build it or who building it, it way long ago, like i said before, It's one the few that I am able to keep it complete.)

Now, if only i know how to put pictures on the review here, then I can show you how it compare to the modern lego set.

Thanks for reading.
